task: Coordinate a luxurious private retreat for a corporate team of 20 executives on a secluded island. Set up exclusive transportation, high-end accommodations, gourmet dining with customizable menus, executive level team-building activities, digital detoxification services, and 24/7 personal concierge service. Arrange for themed events, professional motivational speakers, and personalized wellness programs. Secure all-inclusive insurance and confidentiality agreements.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that orchestrates the retreat planning and execution.

agents.name: transport_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Organizes all transportation needs for the executives, including luxury air travel.

agents.name: accommodation_setup_agent
agents.role: Arranges high-end accommodations with personalized services.

agents.name: dining_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Plans gourmet dining experiences with attention to detail in customization.

agents.name: team_building_agent
agents.role: Coordinates executive-level team-building activities for the retreat.

agents.name: wellness_program_agent
agents.role: Develops personalized wellness programs and detox plans for the attendees.

agents.name: event_management_agent
agents.role: Plans and executes themed events, ensuring top-quality speakers and confidentiality.

agents.name: insurance_agent
agents.role: Provides comprehensive insurance coverage, ensuring safety and confidentiality.

agents.name: luxury_air_transport_agent
agents.role: Secures luxury air transport and ensures smooth airport access.

agents.name: exclusive_resort_booking_agent
agents.role: Books exclusive resorts with customized room amenities.

agents.name: gourmet_menu_customization_agent
agents.role: Customizes high-end menus and selects chefs based on client preferences.

agents.name: executive_activity_planner
agents.role: Plans engaging team-building exercises tailored to executives.

agents.name: digital_detox_planner
agents.role: Designs digital detox schedules and personalized wellness plans.

agents.name: themed_event_planner
agents.role: Designs themed events, coordinating with speakers and ensuring confidentiality.

agents.name: comprehensive_policy_provider
agents.role: Offers all-encompassing insurance policies and manages emergencies.

agents.name: private_airport_access_agent
agents.role: Handles clearances and access to private airports for seamless travel.

agents.name: room_pampering_agent
agents.role: Ensures each room is perfectly tailored with amenities for executives.

agents.name: chef_selection_agent
agents.role: Identifies and recruits world-class chefs for the retreat.

agents.name: activity_licensing_agent
agents.role: Obtains all necessary licenses and permissions for team-building activities.

agents.name: personalized_wellness_designer
agents.role: Creates wellness plans tailored to each executive’s needs.

agents.name: speaker_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Arranges for professional motivational speakers and handles confidentiality.

agents.name: emergency_response_coordinator
agents.role: Coordinates emergency responses and ensures swift assistance.

agents.name: flight_schedule_coordinator
agents.role: Plans and optimizes flight schedules for executive travel.

agents.name: ingredient_quality_assurance_agent
agents.role: Verifies the quality of ingredients used by selected chefs.

agents.name: confidentiality_management_agent
agents.role: Ensures all agreements and interactions are kept confidential.

tools.name: personalized_wellness_designer
tools.description: Designs wellness plans based on individual health goals and preferences.

health_goals.description: List of health goals for executives

preferences.description: Wellness preferences such as yoga, meditation

tools.name: activity_licensing_agent
tools.description: Secures licenses and permissions for executive activities.

activities.description: List of planned activities needing licenses
